TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidationPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ValidationPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ValidationPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Defines the metadata attribute that ASP.NET server controls use to identify a validation property. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This attribute is typically used for form-based input controls.
For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute> class when creating a custom control.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidationPropertyAttribute/CS/validationpropertyattribute1.cs" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidationPropertyAttribute/VB/validationpropertyattribute1.vb" id="Snippet1":::
